question: The Vigilance Awareness Week is observed in India during the birthday of which leader?
explanation:
The Central Vigilance Commission observes the Vigilance Awareness Week from 27th October to 2nd November, 2020.
Every year, this is observed every year during the week in which the birthday of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel falls i.e. 31st October. This year, the theme of the week is Satark Bharat, Samriddh Bharat (Vigilant India, Prosperous India).
